definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Investment banking had to be a separate firm.
sentences.chinese: 投资银行业务必须由独立公司承担。

sentences.english: The price making of SPO is an technological innovation of investment banking.
sentences.chinese: 增发新股的定价是我国投资银行业务在技术上的创新。

sentences.english: Familiar with Bank related business and LC.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉银行业务及信用证。

sentences.english: Mr Sands said client income at the investment bank was up 20 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 冼博德表示，投资银行业务的客户收入增长了20%。

sentences.english: Occasionally change your password via our e-Banking Services.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔改变你的服务密码通过我们的电子银行业务。

sentences.english: For example, a key point of variability in Banking is geography.
sentences.chinese: 例如，对于银行业务，一个重要的变量是地理位置。

sentences.english: Banking and credit card information is stored and accessed by computers.
sentences.chinese: 银行业务及信用卡的资料都要靠计算机储存和支取。

sentences.english: We wanted to protect our banks from contagion.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要保护银行业务免受其影响。

sentences.english: The idea of hiving off the banking operations appears to have been dropped.
sentences.chinese: 剥离银行业务的想法似乎已经放弃了。

sentences.english: The private banking business is on a roll.
sentences.chinese: 私人银行业务正发展得如火如荼。

definition: ICBC (Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)/abbr. for 工商銀行|工商银行[Gong1 Shang1 Yin2 hang2]
same trade or business/person in the same trade or business
